text: Sancey-le-Grand is a former commune. It is in Bourgogne-Franche-Comté in the Doubs department in east France. On 1 January 2016, it was merged with Sancey- le-Long into the new commune of Sancey.Arrêté préfectoral 23 September 2015 == References == Category:Former communes in Doubs
title: Sancey-le-Grand
